{{actor | image = William Kircher 2.jpeg |name=William Kircher |lifetime=[[23 May]] [[1958]] |played=[[Bifur]] |film=[[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]] |played2=[[Tom|Tom Troll]] |film2=''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' |imdb=[https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0456270/ Profile] }} '''William Kircher''' (born 23 May, 1958) is a New Zealand actor who portrayed [[Bifur]] in the [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]],{{webcite|author=[[Peter Jackson]]|articleurl=http://www.facebook.com/note.php?note_id=10150168211921558|articlename=Production begins in New Zealand on The Hobbit|dated=20-March-2011|website=[http://www.facebook.com/ Facebook]|accessed=22-Dec-2011}} as well as [[Tom]] the [[Troll]] in ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''. Kircher attended the Toi Whakaari New Zealand Drama School, graduating with a Diploma at the age of 18 in 1976. He later married Nicole Chesterman Kircher, whom he shares four daughters with. == Trivia == Kircher lied about his age when applying to Toi Whakaari, being only 16 at the time of his admission.{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.stuff.co.nz/entertainment/300230610/william-kircher--the-good-villain|articlename=William Kircher - The good villain|author=Bess Manson|dated=19 February 2021|accessed=21 October 2024}} A prolific stage actor, Kircher has acted in more than 100 plays and at least 30 screen projects.{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.nzonscreen.com/profile/william-kircher|articlename=William Kircher|accessed=21 October 2021}} === Quotes ===
I love being an actor. I am still the eleven year-old boy that first walked onto the stage and I have never lost sight of that child within myself. I have never lost the joy of learning. That is what I love about the job!{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0456270/quotes/?ref_=nm_dyk_qu|articlename=Quotes: William Kircher|author=IMDb|accessed=21 October 2024}}
